//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "PLAYER", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	use ( "outside_ambush_guys_a" );

	affect ( "outside_sargeant", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{

		task ( "take_outside" )
		{
			set ( "SET_GOAL", "FastAdvance" );
			set ( "SET_AREAGOAL", "lower_level" );
		}

		dowait ( "take_outside" );
		use ( "outside_spawner" );
	}

}
